![20250115_115422](https://www.phoenixoregon.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/20250115_115422-1-scaled-e1737049977727-386x400.jpg "20250115 115422")

### Susan Chester - Council President

Susan has been a resident of the Rogue Valley since 1992, when she moved west from Chicago to raise her daughters in a small-town mountain setting. She has been a resident of Phoenix since 2021. As your City Councilor, she is committed to improving the daily lives of our residents, and to focusing on our community’s health, safety, and well being.

She graduated from Washington University in St. Louis with a degree in French/Pre-Med. She founded her first business, The Black Sheep Pub &amp; Restaurant in 1992 to provide a community gathering place, followed by InfoStructure, an IT provider, in 1994. In 2007 she formed the Curtain Climbers Aerial Dance Company, and then opened Catalyst Aerial Arts &amp; Dance studio in 2009. Presently she owns All In Order Organizing LLC, offering professional organizing services to the public since 2020. In addition, Susan shares her aerial arts skills with the students at Ashland Aerial Arts as an aerial instructor and stilt walker.

Susan’s bright energy and welcoming demeanor are well balanced with pragmatism and practicality. As a successful business owner she has honed a wide variety of skills that are extremely useful to our City. For recreation, she enjoys outdoor adventures with her Border Collie, gardening, hiking, biking, skiing, snowboarding, aerial/circus arts, playing piano, partner dancing, people watching, and staring at the night sky.
